price: 31. Nabiyow ku-marak umeynit (Qhureyshi koros kinnuk) naqboytit kok kah abne innaah kulli Nabiih umeyniitik (koros kinnuk) naqboyta hayne, kaadu ku-Rabbi tirri koo haam kee koo cataamah koo xiqah.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina al-muj'rimīna wakafā birabbika hādiyan wanaṣīran
